overview: When a warehouse worker becomes obsessed with a painting, his visions of the Portrait begin to take on a life of their own. He soon finds himself completely absorbed in every aspect of the artwork, spending hours just pondering his life in the picture. His fantasies come to life when the object of his affection (Stormy Daniels) beckons him to her world...The Portrait, it might just be for life...
tagline: Beyond time, beyond obsession, beyond fantasyâ€¦he found her.
title: The Portrait
